title: NFL ATL: Super Bowl XLVIII preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Super Bowl XLVIII preview
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- preview Super Bowl XLVIII, live from New York.  The heroes regale listeners with tales from the around Super Bowl Week, report on their findings after being embedded with the Seattle Seahawks and Denver Broncos, and play the final game of “What’s More Likely?” of the season.  Which team has the edge going into Sunday?  Tune in, find out and join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
